resources.string:
It seems you haven't verified your Email Address yet. You need to verify your Email Address before you can start using Zen Pet Doctors. 

This is a necessary step for us to know your Email is valid and can receive important Email notifications such as appointments, notices, updates, etc from us. 

Press the "Send Verification Email" button to receive the verification email. You can choose "Later" too. However, your Clinic will not be displayed to Users until you verify. 

The process may take a couple of hours to reflect in the system after verification.

Now that you have created your new account on Zen Pets, we need some information about your Clinic / Hospital before your profile can be made public and available for all Zen Pets users. \n\nTo add the Clinic / Hospital information now, click the \"Add Clinic Details\". You can choose to add the information Later too. However, your Clinic / Hospital listing will remain private.
